name: Facebook 'Like' Button
overview:
When user clicks the Facebook Like button it will automatically place the main product/category image and product/category name on the user’s Facebook wall but also will provide them with ability to add comment to the record. Button can be placed on any pages of Magento store – product pages, CMS pages, category pages or Home page.

– Supports HTML5, iFrame and XFBML buttons; – Box and button with count of likes as well as standard layout;

  • Ability to show profile images of Facebook users;
  • Ability to adjust the button to your custom design (button color scheme, font, height/ width and custom verb to display);
  • Indicate app id or admin id and track the button usage on Facebook;
  • Fast installation and set up of the extension with default settings.

Magento Facebook Like button comes with Facebook Send Button. Using this button Facebook users can send message to their friend directly from your Magento store page: this message will contain link to your page and product.

The MagePlace Facebook Like Button supports Magento Community and Enterprise editions.
